snippet: The bank is expected to absorb the most troubled real estate assets of the country's financial institutions.
abstract: Spanish government approves the creation of a so-called bad bank to absorb the most troubled real estate assets of the country’s financial institutions, helping to clear the way for Madrid to receive European rescue money for Spain’s troubled banking industry.
lead_paragraph: The bank is expected to absorb the most troubled real estate assets of the country's financial institutions.

headline.print_headline: Spain O.K.’s ‘Bad Bank’ To Rescue an Industry
